Microsoft.Windows.8.1.with.Update.RTM.x86-x64.AIO.English-CtrlSoft



@  Included all 32-bit and 64-bit editions of Windows 8.1

   - Windows 8 Single Language x86
   - Windows 8 x86
   - Windows 8 Pro x86
   - Windows 8 Pro with Media Center x86
   - Windows 8 Pro VL x86
   - Windows 8 Enterprise x86

   - Windows 8 Single Language x64
   - Windows 8 x64
   - Windows 8 Pro x64
   - Windows 8 Pro with Media Center x64
   - Windows 8 Pro VL x64
   - Windows 8 Enterprise x64

@  Different Windows PE for 32-bit and 64-bit platform
@  Support for UEFI-based or BIOS-based computers for 32-bit and 64-bit platform
@  Support for boot from USB and DVD(!) 32-bit and 64-bit version UEFI
@  Support for 32-bit (BIOS only) and 64-bit Windows Memory Diagnostic
@  Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (MSDaRT) included (only in boot.wim)
@  Advanced installation methods
@  Simplified installation and Windows OOBE setup
@  Support for custom install from 32-bit and 64-bit Windows 7, Windows Server 2008 R2 or any later builds of Windows
@  Support for Upgrade from 32-bit and 64-bit Windows 7, 8, 8.1
@  Support for Full Upgrade from any English Windows 8/8.1 edition to any Windows 8.1 with Update edition
@  Advanced Windows activation features
@  OEM:DM activation support
@  KMS activation support (thx to Ratiborus, MSFree Inc.)
@  Simplified installation .Net Framework
@  Manual or automatic HDD partitioning
@  Skipped online account screen
@  Skipped Network screens
@  Skipped EULA Page
@  No tweaks
@  No packages deleted
@  No turned off futures
